title: Spiritual Refuge Under the Mountain Falls
prompt: (masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, 8k wallpaper), (Modern Anime Style:1.2), a solitary young monk meditating peacefully in the full lotus position, sitting on a mossy rock pedestal in the middle of a stream. He is wearing simple earth-toned robes. He is enveloped by massive, rushing waterfalls cascading down steep, lush, forested cliffs. The background features a towering, snow-capped mountain range under a bright, serene sky. A traditional East Asian pagoda or temple is nestled amongst the distant peaks and clouds. Ethereal morning light beams down, creating brilliant water spray and a tranquil atmosphere. Vertical format (9:16), cinematic lighting, high contrast.
